TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RibbonDismissPopupMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that specify whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup> attached event closes all drop-downs in a chain of drop-downs or only drop-downs that the mouse pointer is not over.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupMode Always = int32(0)

Docs.summary: All drop-downs in a chain are closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupMode MousePhysicallyNotOver = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Drop-downs in a chain are closed up to the one that the mouse pointer is over.
